file.body:
Where is Dharma Sangha now? Ou se trouve Dharma Sangha en ce moment ?
Is Dharma Sangha still not eating anything or just eating herbs from the jungle?
Why is he meditating? What does he want to achieve? Pourquoi médite-t-il ? Que veut-il atteindre ?
Is Dharma Sangha already enlightened? Dharma Sangha a-t-il déjà atteint l'illumination ?
Has he already become a Buddha? Est-il déjà devenu un Bouddha ?
Is his teaching based on Buddhism or any other religions like Hinduism? Son enseignement est-il basé sur le Bouddhisme ou sur d'autres religions comme l'Hindouisme ?
What does "Bodhi Shravan Dharma Sangha" mean?
How can I receive blessing from Dharma Sangha? Comment puis-je recevoir une bénédiction de Dharma Sangha ?
How to reach Ratanpur and Terthup? Comment se rendre à Ratanpur ou Terthup ?
What does Jyampa, Ginphen, Maitri, Maitreya and Metta mean? Que signifie Jyampa, Ginphen, Maitri, Maitreya et Metta ?
I am going to Halkhoriya Jungle. What should I take with me? I also would like to bring some gifts, what is the best choice?
How can I get to Halkhoriya Jungle? Comment se rendre à la jungle d'Halkhoriya ?
He is meditating in Halkhoriya Jungle, Nepal's Bara District. Il médite dans la jungle d'Halkhoriya, dans le district Népalais de Bara.
He is not eating anything.
Dharma Sangha wants to liberate the whole world by spreading Dharma and insight he’ve gained through his meditation. Dharma Sangha veut libérer le monde entier en répendant le Dharma et la perception intérieur qu'il a acquit par la méditation.
Yes, he is already enlightened. The first stages of enlightenment occurred in his room at home. Oui, il a déjà atteint l'illumination. Le premier stade d'illumination est survenu dans sa chambre à son domicile.
Dharma Sangha can’t tell it now. Time will reveal. Dharma Sangha ne peut le dire maintenant. Cela se fera avec le temps.
It is actually called Bodhi Shravan Dharma Sangha, but it includes all religions, no one is excluded. Dharma Sangha will be moving forward by including all existing religions of the world. Cela se nomme Bodhi Shravan Dharma Sangha, mais cela inclut toutes les religions, aucune n'est exlue. Dharma Sangua souhaite inclure prochainement toutes les religions du monde existant à ce jour.
Bodhi: enlightenment, awakened.
Shravan: attending to, heeding, listening.
Dharma: wisdom.
Sangha: association, assembly, community.
Thus "Bodhi Shravan Dharma Sangha" is the wisdom as heeded from enlightened ones.
Please go to Veuillez vous rendre à
Impractical gifts are not really good to bring (pictures, vases etc). Dharma Sangha does not accept gifts. Below is a list of small practical things, which are needed regularly in the jungle:
Scissors.
Kitchenware (bigger pots, which bear direct fire, cutting knives, any non-electric kitchen tools, as there is not much electricity on the site, bigger plastic buckets and storing boxes to keep food safe from monkey-robbers, etc.)
Pens and copybooks.
CANDLES (not perfumed ones).
Sleeping bag or blankets.
Flashlights (solar powered, if possible).
Sealed medicine with English leaflets (especially for colds, cough, wound disinfectants, bandages and first aid supplies).
Lighters.
100% natural material clothes or mats for sitting on the ground.
If anyone has a notebook or laptop, which he or she does not need, and which has a long-lasting battery, it would be also appreciated by the young monks, who are helping Khenpo to write and translate the texts of Dharma Sangha prayers and teachings, etc.
Soap, shampoo, laundry soap.
Mosquito nets and natural sprays.
-->
The most convenience place for foreigner is to land in Kathmandu. From Kathmandu it is about 6 hours drive to Parsa Bridge if you can take a bus or a private vehicle. From Parsa Bridge to Halkhoriya Jungle (about 6-7 km) you can take a tractor, which belongs to Bodhi Shrawan Dharma Sangha, or a 4-wheel vehicle to reach there. The road is a dry river bed and it is rough and bumpy ride. Le plus pratique pour les étrangers est d'atterrir à Katmandu. De Katmandu il y a 6 heures de route jusqu'au pont de Parsa, si vous pouvez prendre un bus ou un véhicule privé. Du pont de Parsa jusqu'à la jungle de Halkhoriya (environ 6-7 km) vous pouvez prendre un tracteur appartenant au Bodhi Shrawan Dharma Sangha, ou un 4x4. La route est un lit de rivière à sec difficile et cahoteuse.
Gompa, Ratanpur Gompa, Ratanpur
Jyampa, Ginphen, Maitri, Maitreya and Metta mean "loving kindness". Jyampa, Ginphen, Maitri, Maitreya et Metta signifie "amour bienveillant".
